DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_006_c:
That monster you defeated, the source of that intense
blizzard... It was summoned by the Demon King.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_007_b:
He thought it could stop you from obtaining the stone
you just foundâ€”my secret stone.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_002_b: It's you... You're the one who's been guiding us?
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_009_b: This is a lot to learn all of a sudden, I know.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_003_c: Yes. I am your ancestor from a time long ago.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_004_b:
I proudly served Hyrule's first king. I was a Rito
warrior and a sage with control of the wind.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_010_b: But listen while I tell you what happened in the past.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_005_b:
Where you fight, the winds follow... I would
expect nothing less from my descendant.
You make me proud.
DmT_RT_StoneMind_Text_012_b:
A tale of the Imprisoning War and the mission our
people must accomplish!
